analysis.key_quote: I unequivocally oppose the implementation or reintroduction of the “Schedule F” classification within the federal civil service. This proposal represents a serious threat to the integrity, independence, and apolitical nature of our government workforce—values that have been carefully cultivated through more than a century of legal and institutional reform.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the Schedule F classification, citing concerns about its impact on the integrity and independence of the civil service, as well as its violation of due process rights and merit-based principles.
